content.question: Which of the following best explains a limitation of the incentives expressed in the advertisement?

choices.label: Many new suburban housing developments of the 1950s practiced racial segregation.
Many middle-class families could not afford to buy homes in new suburban developments in the 1950s.
Many new suburban housing developments of the 1950s restricted access by age.
Many middle-class families preferred to live in cities in the 1950s.

content.answer: Many new suburban housing developments of the 1950s practiced racial segregation.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
